Maya Benari
About Contact

I’m a designer who’s passionate about usable and accessible design, building design systems, and growing a culture of inclusive design.

Work

  • U.S. Web Design System

    I worked as a product manager, designer, and developer on the U.S. Web Design System, a design system for the federal government used by hundreds of agency projects.

     front-end development design systems

  • Demand Clean Power

    I led the front-end development for a national campaign for the National Resource Defense Council that received hundreds of thousands of visits at launch.

     front-end development interaction design

  • Homebase

    As a Code for America fellow, I developed Homebase, a web application to renovate housing safely and efficiently for residents in San Antonio.

     design development branding strategy
